original_title: SJB Badulla District MP Chaminda Wijesiri resigns from Parliament
original_body_lines: Parliament, Jan 09 (Daily Mirror) - SJB MP Chaminda Wijesiri announced his decision to resign from Parliament a short while ago.
MP Wijesiri said he is giving up active politics as well. "I don't have any issue with SJB, though I am going out of politics," he also said.
